newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU approves French EMU convergence plan.
newsitem.headline: EU approves French EMU convergence plan.

text.p: France's plan to bring its economy in line for the start of European monetary union was approved by European Union finance ministers on Monday, an EU source said.
"The French plan has been approved," the source said.
Earlier ministers also approved Germany's plan to bring its economy into shape.
